name: Tower (BeardedDev)
description:
Tower is a simple block stacking game. Place blocks on top of each other to create the tallest tetris-esque tower without letting it topple over.

This is just a short prototype I worked on one weekend (with a little bit of extra time for polish/fixing most of the bugs). It's been quite a while since I've done any 'serious' coding but  thought I'd try getting something out there. I'm working on a few other projects which partially stem from this, so hopefully I can come back and give it a bit more content in the future.
